procedure.name: Extraction of Teeth
procedure.description: Surgical removal of one or more teeth.

irreversibility_statement.description: Extraction of teeth is an irreversible surgical procedure.

teeth_identification.description: Specific teeth to be extracted are listed by the provider.

risks_and_complications: Swelling, bruising, and discomfort at the surgical site
Stretching or cracking at the corners of the mouth
Damage to adjacent teeth or restorations
Temporary or permanent numbness or altered sensation of lips, tongue, chin, or gums
Sharp bone edges or bone splinters requiring additional surgery
Sinus involvement requiring additional care or repair

initialing_required.description: Patient initials each risk acknowledgment paragraph.
